content: have a couple hours to spare grab some bulky yarn and crochet a hat just like that this simple beanie/toque pattern is fast and beginner-friendly difficulty beginner pattern is written in us crochet terms pattern includes two sizes small - approx 8 tall 22 circumference 20 5x56 cm large - approx 9 tall 24 circumference 23x61 cm http //www lifeadorned com/crochet-pattern-just-like-that-hat/ 1 1 http //www lifeadorned com/crochet-pattern-just-like-that-hat/
